results.content: This PHP Blogging workshop was really helpful and it helped me to gain from basic to some advanced knowledge of PHP including working with OOP's concept of PHP. Here I get to work on real world project. I liked the instructor's way of teaching this workshop and I also liked the way of motivating with short video clips and messages in between the workshop sessions and I really thanks Sir for providing this useful and knowledgeable workshop !!!
